name: Cthulhu Asylum
description:
A group of high school students are horror fanatics and find out that an abandoned psych ward is haunted. For their graduation celebration, they decide to explore the psych ward. They soon will learn that was a bad choice.

Warning: There is swearing and gore (arguably).

Keyboard Controls: Arrow Keys = Movement Shift = Dash/Run ESC = Menu/Back/Cancel Space = Activate/OK

Touch Controls: Tap/Point & Click = Movement/Activate/OK  Hamburger icon/Touch with two fingers = Menu/Back

Developer: SoundsbyDane

Music: NolanLReese

Art: SoundsbyDane, Degica. ScourgeDragon
